name: Chaos Adventure
description:
Overview

Is there a back story? No... The adventure is yours to make! Pick a character, and you are dropped into the fantasy middle ages to start your journey!
This game is designed for you to quickly jump right into it and begin hacking and slashing your way through!

I initially created this game to troll my friend, but it has since evolved into something substantial and fun that I'm now sharing with the world!

Key Features

  • Procedure generated world for countless explorations!
  • NPCs to trade with, and potentials to improve your relationship for enlisting them!
  • Build & place walls, workbenches, chests, traps and so many more to aid your quests!
  • Over 40 varieties of enemies!
  • Choose your starting character but level and master yours skills however you see fit!
  • Bring your friends along for the adventure! (Co-op instructions below)

LAN Co-op

To invite and play with friends, we recommend using Hamachi
Both you and your friends will need to install Hamachi. Once installed, please create a network group and invite your friends.
Lastly, use the IPv4 address generated by Hamachi for hosting and connecting.
